title: Japan’s Takaichi aims for blizzard of votes in rare winter election
description: Japanese voters trudged through snow on Sunday to cast their ballots in an election predicted to hand Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi a resounding win, though record dumps in some parts of the country snarled traffic and could dent turnout. The conservative coalition of Takaichi, the nation’s first female leader, is on track to win around [...]

title: Florence LaFarga
description: It is with love and a heavy heart that we share on January 16, 2026, Florence LaFarga passed away peacefully at home, with her children by her side. Born on May 2, 1931, she grew up in Redondo and Hermosa Beach raised by her mom and dad Francisca Mendoza Lujan and Julian Lujan. The oldest [...]

title: Ralph W. Boroff
description: Ralph slipped away, late in the evening of January 30, 2026, peacefully, at home. His wife, DeAnne, was by his side, softly whispering how deeply he was loved. Ralph was diagnosed with Stage 4 Metastatic Lung Cancer on Christmas Eve 2025. He was loath to burden anyone with news of his diagnosis over the holiday [...]

title: Irene Atkinson
description: Irene Atkinson passed away peacefully at the age of 96. She lived a long, full life of service to her family, community and faith. Irene was born in Bisbee, Arizona. She had a 37 year career with Allstate Insurance, was an active member of the First United Methodist Church of Pasadena, and a long time [...]

title: Happy babies: a sign of Super Sale success?
description: Yard-sale season makes a grand entrance at Nez Perce County Fairgrounds

title: James Rogers
description: James R. Rogers, known as “Jim” to his family and friends, was born in San Francisco on April 21, 1938. He passed away peacefully at his home in Los Altos on December 2, 2025 at the age of 87. Jim was married to the love of his life, Patricia Hughes Rogers, for over 61 years [...]

title: Linda Joanne Erickson
description: It is with profound sadness that we announce the passing of Linda Joanne Erickson on January 11, 2026. Linda was born in Toronto, Canada on January 15, 1948, to Doug and Dorothy Gale. She moved to Los Angeles with her family when she was four years old. She earned a B.A. in Communications and her [...]

title: Dora Hayes
description: Maria Dora Hayes, known to all as Dora, passed away on January 27, 2026, at the age of 83. She was born on February 28, 1942. Dora lived in Fairfax, California, for the entirety of her marriage. Dora proudly served in the United States Navy, an experience that reflected her strength, discipline, and independence early [...]

title: Merlin Wendell Call
description: Merlin was born in Long Beach, CA to Harry Truman Call and Bernice Johnson Call.Merlin attended Pasadena schools and earned his LL.B. degree from Stanford Law School.
